TOURNAMENT RULES

  1. Proper attire is required at all times while on the golf course. Any player not adhering to the dress code, will not be allowed on the course, and will forfeit any fees paid.
    Proper attire includes:
    – Dress shorts or slacks
    – Golf shoes or soft-soled footwear
    – Shirts must be worn at all times
    – No tank tops or halter tops
    – No tracks or sweat pants, cut-offs or short shorts
  2. No more than foursomes permitted.
  3. Unnecessary slow play is not permitted. Slow groups with a clear hole ahead must allow faster players through or will be required to leave the course.
  4. No alcoholic beverages allowed on the golf course.
  5. You must obey Course Marshall or you will lose the right to play.
  6. Pull carts, gas carts, and golf bags are not allowed on tees and greens, including the aprons.
  7. You are responsible for all damages to carts and golf course.
  8. You must replace divots, repair ball marks on the greens, rake all traps.
  9. Greens fee good for one round only.

RULES OF PLAY

  1. It is a best ball tournament.
  2. That means each player hits his/her shot from the spot of the last "best" shot.
  3. The score is calculated as a team total.
  4. Each "best" shot is determined through consensus of the individual team members.
  5. Please ensure that Mr. Mulligan is not in any foursome.
  6. Obey all out of bounds markers.
  7. Please obey speed limits on driving carts—police are on duty.
  8. Have a good time! If you don't have a good time it's your own @#$%$#% fault!
  9. Good Luck!
